storyInfo: Legend tells of an ascended Xian, possibly an elder Tianshi, residing deep in the woods. Wanqing embarks on a journey to seek this sage's advice on challenges in his research.

attributes.content: It is said that one who has ascended to Xiandom dwells deep in the forest, one who knows the way of Heaven, one whom the clouds follow from dawn to dusk.
There is no telling what is real and what is not within the clouds.
The only thing that points the way is a heart that seeks the truth.
*pant* *pant*... The fog's getting thicker.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This place looks familiar. Have I already been here?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Still no signal from the drone, and no one to ask directions...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: A girl from the mountains? Ni hao! I...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Hey, I just wanted to ask the way—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Alright, alright, don't run, I'm not chasing you! It's dangerous running through the mountains in this fog!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: She wants me to follow her?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This is the path I took up the mountain... Seems like I've been going around in circles.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Oh, ni hao.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This path will take you down the mountain.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: I'm not trying to go down. I heard of a plot of farmland in the middle of a forest here. Do you know where it is? It's so hard to find the way in this fog.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I've never heard of any place like that. You've heard some random rumors, just like the other tourists.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: It's not a rumor... I can prove it. I have a picture of the farm here. Does it look familiar?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Never seen it. Don't believe everything you hear. Leave before nightfall, if you know what's good for you.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: You hardly looked at it... but I suppose you weren't even born when the photo was taken. Sorry for bothering you. I'll keep looking.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Assuming it exists, isn't it strange that any living soul would want to live there, where there's no water, electricity, or anyone nearby? Unless—
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Well, it's getting late. You should get home before it's totally dark. Be careful.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You're still going into the mountains... you just don't listen, do you?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: The one who lives there is a very experienced... hey, where did she go?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This fog again.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Reports say fog covers this place nine days out of ten, all year round. There's no time to wait for the fog to disperse. I have to try my luck.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Still no signal from the drone, and visibility keeps getting worse. This is weird. Could it be like the girl said...?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No, no, have faith in science.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wait... was this path there just now?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What is this place? Brr, it's cold. Shouldn't I still be halfway up the mountain?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wait, this forest—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It looks exactly the same as the one in the photo. That clearing up there must be—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: That's the field—!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: There is a plot of farmland in the misty woods. A few stalks of bean grow on the edge amongst some weeds. There is no snow in a large area around it.
He Sheng crouches down and starts measuring the beans with his Tianshi apparatus, comparing them to his failed attempts.
The pods are at the perfect height, of a cold-resistant breed, and growing on the shaded side of the mountain. It must be the work of the one he is seeking.
He Sheng leaps up and casts his gaze across the farm, towards the lone hut standing in the fog, and runs for the faint silhouette without a thought.
At first he's running...
But soon he starts to hesitate, and slows to a walk...
Clay jar, miniature pine, weeder.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Again. Clay jar, miniature pine, weeder. One step, two steps, three steps, clay jar, miniature pine, weeder.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I'm not moving forward at all! I can't close the distance.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Maybe I'll take a detour...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What if I leap from the trees?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Arrrggghhh—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Try as he might, he cannot reach the hut that seems so close. He sits by the side with his head hanging low. The weeds in the field add to his frustration, so he decides to clean them out.
That's better... it's so humid. The weeder's almost sticking to my hand.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I can't just sit around... what should I do next?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Ahem.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: You again, kid? Aren't your parents worried about you being out here so late?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: If you've come to seek the secrets of ascension from the Xian, you've come to the wrong place. Don't waste your time.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Y-You know him, don't you?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I guess I've come to seek secrets, but not about ascension. He's a Nongye Tianshi I've never met. There's something really important that I need to ask him...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's been bothering me for a long time.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He won't be back for another few years.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Oh...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Why are you trying to chase me away then? You were really eager to get me to leave before, back when I was halfway up.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I-I wasn't! I just didn't want you to waste your time!
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Waste my time? All his work is here.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Did he ask you to pass on a message?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Hm... you're not as dumb as you look.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Alright. He wants you to... er...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Well, uh—
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: The girl makes circles with her fingers, pointing from the farmland to the foothills.
The one who seeks is the same as ever. Do you understand?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: (Farmland, circle, same as ever.)
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The author of this thesis went on a journey? Does anyone know how to reach him?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Hmph, you want to reach him? You have no idea how he despises us for being 'polluted by worldly matters'. I'm surprised he even waited to finish his thesis before leaving!
attributes.name: Displeased Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: No one has heard from him since then. No one knows where he went.
attributes.name: Displeased Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Why? Do you absolutely need his help with a project?
attributes.name: Displeased Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: Yes, I want to develop a 'High Pod Mk2' that can be harvested by machine and grows well in shade and cold, but I haven't been able to get the results I wanted. I've been stuck for half a year now...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I must be missing something.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I tell you what, there's something you can try. Look in the database...
attributes.name: Displeased Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: I've been over the agricultural news, but I haven't seen anything that might have something to do with this Tianshi.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No. What I mean is, look for local legends and rumors—
attributes.name: Displeased Nongye Tianshi

attributes.content: This tea's really bitter, but it does wake you up. Kind of serves as medicine.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Phew—let's keep going. There's so much gossip and rumor that my eyes are glazing over... where was I?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: 'Water fighting water monsters'... 'One color missing from the seven-colored auspicious clouds'... 'Smell of fried noodles from abandoned well'... nothing relevant.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: 'Opera-singing cloudbeast'? I should forward this to Grain Buds.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: 'The Xian who guides in the mists'... This came not long after that thesis.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Wait, this picture...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng zooms in and presses his face against the screen, staring at the farmland in the middle of the image.
The crops in the field are faintly visible through the fog. He Sheng's eyes grow wider as he identifies them.
M-Master! I...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The Xian who guides in the mists.
Rumor has it that this ascended Xian dwells on the peak of a mountain that is forever shrouded by auspicious clouds.
No one has seen the Xian's face, but those who walk into the fog have their questions answered, and the way shown to them.
Truth and lies, reality and illusion, all are revealed at the Xian's guidance.
Xian's guidance... I see.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: (Farmland, circle, same as ever.)
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Now I get it!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You said you passed on my message?
Y-Yes.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Did you tell him unambiguously to get lost?
Well, pretty much, I suppose...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Then why is he still here and plowing my farm?!
Judging from the gadget he's using to plow and the silver patterns on his clothes, I guess he came from the Tianshi Bureau too, much like yourself?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Hmph.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: You know from the start that he needs your guidance for his questions.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: He was polite, so I responded in kind. I made circular gestures with my hands to subtly suggest that he should get going. Oh... Maybe he misunderstood and interpreted it as an instruction to plow.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: What...!
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: Listen, tell him this, and don't you change a single word this time—
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.text: Your homework is not my problem!
\nYou've got a brain, so use it for your own research!
\nIf you don't have one, go home and eat some walnuts!
\n—Former Nongye Tianshi (author of 'A New Technological Prospect for Increasing Soybean Yield')

attributes.content: You again? Oh my... Is it already this late?!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng wipes his sweat and realizes that he was so occupied with plowing that he hardly thought about the meaning behind the elder Tianshi's advice.
Like a student who forgot his homework, he wishes he could hide inside his Tianshi apparatus.
Ahem... the Xian, he says...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Your homework is... er...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Homework? So he knows why I'm here. But I'm not sure I understood the hint.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I know that research isn't about working for its own sake. I need to think deeper about it.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: ('Your homework is not my problem!'... 'Go home and eat some walnuts!'... How am I supposed to tell him that?!)
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: He says that... um, one must learn to be independent... and, uh, don't just stay on the farms, it's time to leave and get some nutrition.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Nutrition.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: No, no, the first part is the important one. Leave.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Leave and get some nutrition.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Ah, I understand now! I'll be going!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What? You're really going?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Yeah, no better time than now!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The mountain is covered in clouds and the curtain of night. The forests are silent, except for soft footsteps.
Slowly, the sound of liquid sloshing and splashing spreads in the mist and cloud, along with a peculiar odor.
Hm... *sniff*... uh...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: What's that sound... and smell...?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Oh... whoa... AAAHHHH!
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Th-That guy came back with fertilizer! He's dissolving it in water and spraying it on the field!
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: What's going on... Is that what he thought was 'nutrition'?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: What nutrition?
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: Ah! N-Nothing! Absolutely nothing at all.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Well, maybe it's slightly my fault... A-Anyways, what do you want to say to him this time? I'll definitely, absolutely pass it on word for word.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Just give this to him. No need to say anything.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: This... It's from your farm...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Good morning. Do you bring new instructions?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: This is... three soybean seeds?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng looks back and forth between the soybeans in the fields and the seeds in his hand, then at the field beside him. His furrowed brow gradually begins to relax.
I see. All is revealed. I completely understand what he means now!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It began when I removed the weeds in the fields by chance. He saw and guided me to plow the field and fertilize it, all in preparation for this moment—planting these three seeds.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He's encouraging me to continue!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I must thank him for his guidance, and grow these seeds with all the knowledge I possess!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The fog's getting thicker? W-Well, I won't give up.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: He Sheng sits down and opens his bag, taking out various items, including a portable soil analyzer, drone, experiment logbook, labels, and beakers.
After the preparations, he grabs a bunch of soil and sniffs it, silently saying 'hello' to it.
The next day...
I've finished planting, sir. Here is the data collected today.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: It's foggy and wet today, which may be hard on one's joints. I've made some ginger tea for you to keep you warm. I'll put it here.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Two days later...
Today is the second day after planting. I've come to report the data.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I made porridge with some grains from Dahuang. I didn't add any sugar and let it cook until the grains were nice and soft. It should be easy on your teeth and blood sugar.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Six days later...
Tomorrow, we will know if the seeds will sprout.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: To be honest, I'm not expecting much, considering that I've failed for the past six months.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Maybe I was going down the wrong path. My seeds require too much sunlight, and they don't grow tall enough to be harvested by machine.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: I wanted to ask how you planted them. I saw a few on the farm that were the ideal height. I was hoping there would be more, so that I could take a few seeds back...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Do you mean there's no need to overthink it? Right. I will focus on my work then.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Yes?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Uh... let me repeat the Xian's message, word by word—
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.text: 'Is farming the only thing rattling around in that head of yours? If you love sitting in a field and munching on a diet of wind, you might as well become a weed!'

attributes.content: Umm?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Ahem... I'll add my explanation just in case you don't understand: Haven't you forgotten something important?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Data? Let me check.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Put down the data. Think about it. At first, you were still bringing food to the Xian...
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Oh no! Is the Xian—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Stop. What I mean is—have you eaten in the past two days?
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Oh, you're right!
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Seven days later...
The soybeans are entering their sprouting period, but there's no sign of sprouting.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Eight days later...
Nine days later...
He's been quiet these past few days.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: Pretty evil of you to give him seeds that won't sprout.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: Academia loves serious people like him. But there's one thing that he doesn't see—
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: The brick wall.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: If you want him to learn to give up, why are you still pacing like that? You're making me dizzy. If you're worried, I'll go check on him.
attributes.name: Girl in the Mountains

attributes.content: No need. Once he hits that brick wall, he'll go home on his own.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: Though with his stubborn attitude, that wall could be the death of him. Can't have that happening in my fields.
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: He Sheng is lying down on the bare fields, his palms against the soil, gazing silently up at the sky.
He feels an odd sense that the hut he can never reach seems even further away now, disappearing into the fog and out of sight.
Not just the hut, but everything around him. The fences are gone, the forest is gone. All that is left is this farmland and the sky above his head.
The soil and the sky—the two most important things to a farmer.
He seems to hear a tiny sound from the soil...
Bang!
The sound of a wooden door being kicked open snaps him back. He Sheng turns from where he is lying and sees an unfamiliar young man emerging from the fog—
He Sheng narrows his eyes in confusion.
What is WRONG with you?! How are you still planting those seedings?
When my master had me plant the second seed, I already knew that it was a dud and that it was time to change direction.
You, though, just don't get it even after so many days. I had to come out and actually say it to your face—
You hoped there would be more beanstalks in my field? Well, have you stopped to think why there are so few even after so many years?!
If it takes hitting a brick wall for you to turn around, then you're just not cut out for research...
The tirade comes to a sudden stop when he sees the field beside He Sheng.
He Sheng stares in disbelief at the surprisingly young man whom he thought would be an elderly Tianshi.
The young man, however, stares in greater disbelief at the beanstalk next to He Sheng. The sprout is green and crooked, but it has, indeed, sprouted.
He Sheng looks upward to see the fog has dispersed, revealing a clear blue sky.
I, er, was trying to be a weed, though I'm not sure how it should feel...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: What?! I meant you were dumb as a weed, not that you should BECOME a weed!
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: But if I listen carefully, it's as if I can hear—
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The sound of the sprout breaking through the seed shell and growing outwards.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You're hallucinating because of hunger! Get up!
attributes.name: 'Ascended Xian'

attributes.content: No, I really do hear...
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The Xian slaps him back and forth.
Get up! Get up, you!
Stop sleeping, Big Buffalo!
A soybean leaf slaps He Sheng on the face repeatedly.
How could you fall asleep during the bean harvest? Get up, you stupid buffalo!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You're gonna get run over by a harvester!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Grain Buds? Did I... fall asleep?
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: You told me to come watch the first harvest of your 'High Pod Mk3', yet you're taking a nap yourself!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Anyway, it's no fun watching machines harvest beans. I've seen enough. Let's go play with Mianmian!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Oh, I saw that 'Opera-singing cloudbeast' thing you sent me last time. Mianmian says he doesn't like opera, but he wants to give rock n' roll a go.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: Wanna come and listen? It'll make him real happy!
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: No, I still have a lot of analysis to do after the harvest.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: Pfft. Then I'll tell Shu that you were napping in the fields.
attributes.name: Grain Buds

attributes.content: You do you, I'm not going.
attributes.name: He Sheng

attributes.content: The girl makes a face and disappears from sight.
He Sheng rises from the soybean field, watching as the harvester glides smoothly through the rows. Amidst the rumble of machinery, he could almost hear the sound of beans maturing.
